function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Centralized fresh food markets leading to movement restrictions and closure impacts","Impact":"Limited access to fresh food, potential food shortages, and increased risk of crowding and contagion","Mitigation":"Distributed fresh food supplies closer to neighborhoods, introduced community-based cashless farmers markets, implemented fruit preservation techniques, and created new space for walking and cycling","Technologies":"Community-based cashless payment systems, fruit preservation technology, urban planning for pedestrian and cycling infrastructure","People":"Neighborhood residents, farmers, government officials","Owner":"Government, community organizations, food manufacturers"},{"Description":"Flaws in urban infrastructure reducing resilience to food insecurity and promoting unsafe physical activity","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to food insecurity, reduced physical activity due to unsafe streets","Mitigation":"Reflecting on and evaluating community-based fresh food supply interventions, creating new space for walking and cycling, shifting focus to television and social media-based exercise programs","Technologies":"Urban planning for pedestrian and cycling infrastructure, media-based exercise programs","People":"Urban residents, government officials, health organizations","Owner":"Government, health organizations"}]}
